rule1.name: RuleColumn
rule1.desc: There is no column %s in table %s
rule1.sgs: Try to remove column %s from query

rule2.name: RuleTable
rule2.desc: There is no table %s in database

rule3.name: RuleForeignKey
rule3.desc: Column %s in table %s is not foreign key

rule4.name: RuleAlias
rule4.desc: There is not quotes in alias with more than one word
rule4.sgs: Try to add quotes on start and on end of allias

rule5.name: RuleWhere
rule5.desc: There is function of aggregation in WHERE part
rule5.sgs: Try to remove function of aggregation
